title: Course to Improve Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Using Motivational Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in a VR environment where real-life problems are solved through mathematical modeling. Applying personalized strategies based on analysis of individual learner motivation levels.

learning_goals: Learners sustain motivation for solving mathematical problems by applying the ARCS Model (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction)
Learners establish strategies to solve complex mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners improve their motivation levels by at least three stages through peer feedback and formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
